author: Nicole Gallucci
title: Which 'Office' characters would make the best quarantine buddies? We figured it out.
description: We're all stuck inside, we're all watching Netflix, which means a huge portion of the nation is watching — or in all likelihood rewatching — The Office. So when people started choosing which quarantine houses they'd like to live in, Mashable's first inclinati…
